verses.verse: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֲחִיתֹ֖פֶל <WH302> Moreover Ahithophel אֶל־ <WH413> unto אַבְשָׁלֹ֑ם <WH53> unto Absalom אֶבְחֲרָ֣ה <WH977> Let me now choose out נָּ֗א <WH4994> I beseech thee שְׁנֵים־ <WH8147> both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ten אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> thousand אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men וְאָק֛וּמָה <WH6965> and I will arise וְאֶרְדְּפָ֥ה <WH7291> and pursue אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> after דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> David הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> this night

וְאָב֣וֹא <WH935> And I will come עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> and וְה֤וּא <WH1931> he יָגֵ֙עַ֙ <WH3023> upon him while he [is] weary וּרְפֵ֣ה <WH7504> and weak יָדַ֔יִם <WH3027> handed וְהַֽחֲרַדְתִּ֣י <WH2729> and will make him afraid אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וְנָ֖ס <WH5127> that [are] with him shall flee כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <WH5221> and I will smite אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> alone

וְאָשִׁ֥יבָה <WH7725> And I will bring back כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> all the people אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> about כְּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> [is] as if all returned הַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> of everyone הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> unto thee the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you מְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <WH1245> whom thou seekest כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> [so] all the people יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> will be at שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> shall be in peace

וַיִּישַׁ֥ר <WH3474> pleased הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> And the saying בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> well אַבְשָׁלֹ֑ם <WH53> Absalom וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> affliction כָּל־ <WH3605> and all זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> and all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> Then said אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> Absalom קְרָ֣א <WH7121> Call נָ֔א <WH4994> Now גַּ֖ם <WH1571> also לְחוּשַׁ֣י <WH2365> now Hushai הָאַרְכִּ֑י <WH757> the Archite וְנִשְׁמְעָ֥ה <WH8085> also and let us hear מַה־ <WH4100> what בְּפִ֖יו <WH6310> likewise what he saith גַּם־ <WH1571> also הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> was come חוּשַׁי֮ <WH2365> And when Hushai אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְשָׁלוֹם֒ <WH53> to Absalom וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> spake אַבְשָׁל֨וֹם <WH53> Absalom אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto him saying כַּדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> after this manner הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> hath spoken אֲחִיתֹ֔פֶל <WH302> Ahithophel הֲנַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> shall we do אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> act אִם־ <WH518> lo אַ֖יִן <WH369> else אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you דַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> speak ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said חוּשַׁ֖י <WH2365> And Hushai אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH53> unto Absalom לֹֽא־ <WH3808> is not טוֹבָ֧ה <WH2896> [is] not good הָעֵצָ֛ה <WH6098> The counsel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יָעַ֥ץ <WH3289> hath given אֲחִיתֹ֖פֶל <WH302> that Ahithophel בַּפַּ֥עַם <WH6471> at this time הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> For said חוּשַׁ֗י <WH2365> Hushai אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You יָ֠דַעְתָּ <WH3045> thou knowest אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֨יךָ <WH1> thy father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲנָשָׁ֜יו <WH376> [is] a man כִּ֧י <WH3588> for גִבֹּרִ֣ים <WH1368> that they [be] mighty men הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like וּמָרֵ֥י <WH4751> and they [be] chafed נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> in their minds הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> like כְּדֹ֥ב <WH1677> as a bear שַׁכּ֖וּל <WH7909> robbed בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of her whelps in the field וְאָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> and thy father אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> is an expert מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> of war וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and will not יָלִ֖ין <WH3885> and will not lodge אֶת־ <WH854> with הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> with the people

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold עַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> has now הֽוּא־ <WH1931> himself נֶחְבָּא֙ <WH2244> Behold he is hid בְּאַחַ֣ת <WH259> now in some הַפְּחָתִ֔ים <WH6354> pit א֖וֹ <WH176> or בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> or in some הַמְּקוֹמֹ֑ת <WH4725> [other] place וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> has been כִּנְפֹ֤ל <WH5307> and it will come to pass when some of them be overthrown בָּהֶם֙ בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <WH8462> at the first וְשָׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> that whosoever הַשֹּׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> heareth וְאָמַ֔ר <WH559> it will say הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> has been מַגֵּפָ֔ה <WH4046> There is a slaughter בָּעָ֕ם <WH5971> among the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> that follow אַבְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <WH53> Absalom

וְה֣וּא <WH1931> he גַם־ <WH1571> and even בֶּן־ <WH1121> men חַ֗יִל <WH2428> and [they] which [be] with him [are] valiant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose לִבּ֛וֹ <WH3820> whose heart כְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> [is] as the heart הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <WH738> of a lion הִמֵּ֣ס <WH4549> shall utterly יִמָּ֑ס <WH4549> melt כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יֹדֵ֤עַ <WH3045> knoweth כָּל־ <WH3605> for all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> for all Israel כִּי־ <WH3588> is a גִבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> [is] a mighty man אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> that thy father וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> man חַ֖יִל <WH2428> are valiant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יָעַ֗צְתִּי <WH3289> Therefore I counsel הֵ֠אָסֹף <WH622> be generally יֵאָסֵ֨ף <WH622> gathered עָלֶ֤יךָ <WH5921> that כָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> that all Israel מִדָּן֙ <WH1835> unto thee from Dan וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּאֵ֣ר שֶׁ֔בַע <WH884> even to Beersheba כַּח֥וֹל <WH2344> as the sand אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> is by הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> that [is] by the sea לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> for multitude וּפָנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> in thine own person הֹלְכִ֖ים <WH1980> and that thou go בַּקְרָֽב׃ <WH7128> to battle

וּבָ֣אנוּ <WH935> So shall we come אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about [בְּאַחַת כ] (בְּאַחַ֤ד <WH259> one ק) הַמְּקוֹמֹת֙ <WH4725> place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who נִמְצָ֣א <WH4672> where he shall be found שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it וְנַ֣חְנוּ <WH5117> cease עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who יִפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> falleth הַטַּ֖ל <WH2919> upon him as the dew עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> on the ground וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not נ֥וֹתַר <WH3498> that [are] with him there shall not be left בּ֛וֹ וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH582> and of him and of all the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> not גַּם־ <WH1571> so much as אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> upon him in some

וְאִם־ <WH518> Moreover if אֶל־ <WH413> into עִיר֙ <WH5892> into a city יֵֽאָסֵ֔ף <WH622> he be gotten וְהִשִּׂ֧יאוּ <WH5375> bring כָֽל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> then shall all Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> to that city הַהִ֖יא <WH1931> he חֲבָלִ֑ים <WH2256> ropes וְסָחַ֤בְנוּ <WH5498> and we will draw אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> עַד־ <WH5704> into הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> it into the river עַ֛ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> not נִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> found שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there גַּם־ <WH1571> until there be not one צְרֽוֹר׃ <WH6872> small stone פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <WH53> And Absalom וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel טוֹבָ֗ה <WH2896> [is] better עֲצַת֙ <WH6098> The counsel חוּשַׁ֣י <WH2365> of Hushai הָאַרְכִּ֔י <WH757> the Archite מֵעֲצַ֖ת <WH6098> than the counsel אֲחִיתֹ֑פֶל <WH302> of Ahithophel וַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD צִוָּ֗ה <WH6680> had appointed לְהָפֵ֞ר <WH6565> to defeat אֶת־ <WH853> עֲצַ֤ת <WH6098> counsel אֲחִיתֹ֙פֶל֙ <WH302> of Ahithophel הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> the good לְבַעֲב֗וּר <WH5668> to the intent הָבִ֧יא <WH935> might bring יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> on אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH53> upon Absalom אֶת־ <WH853> הָרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> evil ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said חוּשַׁ֗י <WH2365> Hushai אֶל־ <WH413> to צָד֤וֹק <WH6659> unto Zadok וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to אֶבְיָתָר֙ <WH54> and to Abiathar הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> the priests כָּזֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise וְכָזֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise יָעַ֤ץ <WH3289> counsel אֲחִיתֹ֙פֶל֙ <WH302> Thus and thus did Ahithophel אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְשָׁלֹ֔ם <WH53> Absalom וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְכָזֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise וְכָזֹ֖את <WH2063> I יָעַ֥צְתִּי <WH3289> and thus and thus have I counselled אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

וְעַתָּ֡ה <WH6258> Now שִׁלְח֣וּ <WH7971> Now therefore send מְהֵרָה֩ <WH4120> quickly וְהַגִּ֨ידוּ <WH5046> and tell לְדָוִ֜ד <WH1732> David לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying אַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֤לֶן <WH3885> Lodge הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <WH3915> not this night בְּעַֽרְב֣וֹת <WH6160> the fords הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> of the wilderness וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> again עָב֣וֹר <WH5674> but speedily תַּעֲב֑וֹר <WH5674> pass over פֶּ֚ן <WH6435> or יְבֻלַּ֣ע <WH1104> be swallowed up לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> lest the king וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

וִיהוֹנָתָ֨ן <WH3083> Now Jonathan וַאֲחִימַ֜עַץ <WH290> and Ahimaaz עֹמְדִ֣ים <WH5975> stayed בְּעֵין־ רֹגֵ֗ל <WH5883> by Enrogel וְהָלְכָ֤ה <WH1980> went הַשִּׁפְחָה֙ <WH8198> and a wench וְהִגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> and told לָהֶ֔ם וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> like יֵֽלְכ֔וּ <WH1980> go וְהִגִּ֖ידוּ <WH5046> and told לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יוּכְל֛וּ <WH3201> for they might לְהֵרָא֖וֹת <WH7200> not be seen לָב֥וֹא <WH935> to come הָעִֽירָה׃ <WH5892> into the city

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw אֹתָם֙ <WH853> נַ֔עַר <WH5288> Nevertheless a lad וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <WH5046> them and told לְאַבְשָׁלֹ֑ם <WH53> Absalom וַיֵּלְכוּ֩ <WH1980> departed שְׁנֵיהֶ֨ם <WH8147> both מְהֵרָ֜ה <WH4120> of them away quickly וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ ׀ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> house אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> to a man's בְּבַחוּרִ֗ים <WH980> in Bahurim וְל֥וֹ בְאֵ֛ר <WH875> which had a well בַּחֲצֵר֖וֹ <WH2691> in his court וַיֵּ֥רְדוּ <WH3381> they went down שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> whither

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> And the woman וַתִּפְרֹ֤שׂ <WH6566> and spread אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּסָךְ֙ <WH4539> a covering עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> mouth הַבְּאֵ֔ר <WH875> over the well's וַתִּשְׁטַ֥ח <WH7849> and spread עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> over הָֽרִפ֑וֹת <WH7383> ground corn וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not נוֹדַ֖ע <WH3045> was not known דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> thereon and the thing

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> came עַבְדֵי֩ <WH5650> servants אַבְשָׁל֨וֹם <WH53> And when Absalom's אֶֽל־ <WH413> to הָאִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> to the woman הַבַּ֗יְתָה <WH1004> to the house וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> they said אַיֵּ֗ה <WH346> Where אֲחִימַ֙עַץ֙ <WH290> Where [is] Ahimaaz וִיה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> Jonathan וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ הָֽאִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> to the woman עָבְר֖וּ <WH5674> unto them They be gone over מִיכַ֣ל <WH4323> the brook הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> of water וַיְבַקְשׁוּ֙ <WH1245> And when they had sought וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not מָצָ֔אוּ <WH4672> and could not find וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> [them] they returned יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem ס

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> And it came to pass after לֶכְתָּ֗ם <WH1980> had departed וַֽיַּעֲלוּ֙ <WH5927> that they came up מֵֽהַבְּאֵ֔ר <WH875> out of the well וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> and went וַיַּגִּ֖דוּ <WH5046> and told לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> David וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto David ק֣וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise וְעִבְר֤וּ <WH5674> over מְהֵרָה֙ <WH4120> and pass quickly אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> the water כִּי־ <WH3588> for כָ֛כָה <WH3602> thus יָעַ֥ץ <WH3289> counselled עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> against אֲחִיתֹֽפֶל׃ <WH302> for thus hath Ahithophel
